name: GKCylindersNoiseSource
desc: A procedural noise generator whose output is a 3D field of concentric cylindrical shells.

items.name: init(frequency: Double)
items.desc: Initializes a cylinder noise source with the specified frequency.

items.name: class func cylindersNoise(withFrequency: Double) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a cylinder noise source with the specified frequency.

items.name: var frequency: Double
items.desc: A value that determines the size and spacing of concentric cylinders.
